page.title: 12HOME LIFE
page.content: The most common type of{house}is detached.The average number of rooms is four though most houses have just over the average.There were more homes where there were one or two people living there than any other number.A great number of older people come here to retire and there are also six old peoples bungalows.Most people have{electric cookers and colour {televisions,record players and radios but only a few had dishwashers, computers and videos.Most people have bathrooms but hardly any people have caravans.Most people are connected to the main sewers.There is a{sewerage}at the bottom of the hill.Cats are the most popular pet.About a quarter of the people use the{bus services.}On Tuesdays a bus goes to Abergavenny and Wednesdays,Hereford.People mostly get their groceries from Hereford.
